sourcesContent:
<template>
	<van-space direction="vertical" class="w-full h-full">
		<van-button
			v-if="nativeData.platform === 'ios'"
			type="primary"
			size="large"
			color="#1d1d1d"
			round
			@click="appleSign"
		>
			<template v-slot:icon>
				<font-awesome-icon icon="fa-brands fa-apple" size="lg" class="mr-1" />
			</template>
			{{ 'Apple' }}
		</van-button>
		<van-button
			type="primary"
			plain
			size="large"
			color="#1d1d1d"
			round
			@click="googleSign"
		>
			<template v-slot:icon>
				<font-awesome-icon icon="fa-brands fa-google" />
			</template>
			{{ 'Google' }}
		</van-button>
	</van-space>
</template>

<script setup>
import appBridge from '@/mixins/app-bridge';
import { useStore } from 'vuex';
import { computed } from 'vue';

const store = useStore();

const nativeData = computed(() => store.state.Auth.nativeData);

function googleSign() {
	appBridge.methods.nativeSendEvent('googleSignin');
}

function appleSign() {
	appBridge.methods.nativeSendEvent('appleSignin');
}
</script>

<style></style>
